title: Bloomberg Markets: FedEx Profit Hurt by Cyberattack (Correct)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: FedEx Profit Hurt by Cyberattack (Correct)
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Lee A Klaskow\u0010Senior Analyst:Logistics\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing FedEx Corp. cutting its annual profit forecast, citing the $300 million cost of a June cyberattack on its TNT Express unit.\u0010\u0010Note: This corrects the statement that FedEx's LTL business is unionized, that audio has been omitted.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
